title: Clubhouse rolls out in-room chat for when you want to participate nonverbally
content:
For the past two years, people have been increasingly depending on the online world — as merely having a coffee with your loved ones can put you all at risk. On the internet, people can socialize without having to worry about a virus that has taken many lives and disrupted world economies. And that’s how

The post Clubhouse rolls out in-room chat for when you want to participate nonverbally appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Clubhouse users on iOS and Android can now chat through text inside rooms, for when they want to participate nonverbally.
